price: 46. Dan dia berbicara dengan manusia (sewaktu) dalam buaian dan ketika sudah dewasa, dan dia termasuk di antara orang-orang yang salih."
arabic: وَيُكَلِّمُ ٱلنَّاسَ فِي ٱلۡمَهۡدِ وَكَهۡلٗا وَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayukallimu al-nāsa fī al-mahdi wakahlan wamina al-ṣāliḥīna
